gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Semi-arid Grassland Research Center (SGRC) Surface Meteorological Station Data
Semi-arid Grassland Research Center (SGRC) Surface Meteorological Station Data

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Surface meteorological measurements collected by a Climatronics All-In-One (AIO) Weather Sensor during the BioAerosols and Convective Storms (BACS) field campaigns.
